about_the_game:
“...... Don't you really want to marry him? ”

Synopsis of the story:
In the sixteenth year of the Republic of China, Shanghai.
Bai Youfu, a young girl who was dissatisfied with the arranged marriage, saw the news of her fiancé's murder in the newspaper one day, pointing to the innocent woman as the murderer. In order to protect her father, who is the deputy chief of the police, she decides to leave home and thus leads to a point of divergence of fate.
Who greeted her in the pouring rain?

Game Description:
This game is a traditional otome visual novel set in the Republic of China, with 1927 as the historical stage, including 4 strategy routes and 17 endings.
The narrative of this game takes the heroine as the main perspective and includes the secondary perspective of other characters.
Your choices will determine the fate and outcome of your character.

Notes:
1. This work is purely fictional and has no connection with any real people, events, groups or organizations.
2. Contains slightly bloody or frightening depictions.
3. The demo version has a gameplay time of about 3 hours, including 2 gameover endings and 1 common ending.
4. The official version has a gameplay time of about 6-8 hours and includes 13 official endings, 3 gameover endings, and 1 common ending.
5. Please do not publicly hide the content of the line game through recording, live broadcasting, live broadcasting, etc.
6. The game does not contain any sexual content, and the content of the tag has nothing to do with the author.

Notes on the plot:
1. The heroine is a traditional girl.
2. Contains a considerable degree of radical setting and plot.
3. This game is made by the author alone, and it is a completely personal work, so there is no need to expect it.
4. If there is content that does not suit your wishes, please close the game immediately without further ado.
5. Your support is the motivation for the author to continue creating!

Related intelligence guidance author Weibo @焰桐_每天睡够十小时

content_descriptors.notes: The characters in the game are all adults. Images involving blood jets splattering the screen, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, prostitution, torture, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-inflicted suicide.

name: Tide—1927—

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows10/8/7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In the 16th year of the Republic of China, Shanghai. Bai Youfu, a young girl who was dissatisfied with the arranged marriage, saw the news of her fiancé's murder in the newspaper one day, pointing to the innocent woman as the murderer. In order to protect her father, she decides to leave home.
